FuncDef:
The ocsp nonce enable command adds a nonce extension to the OCSP request sent by a PKI entity.
The undo ocsp nonce enable command cancels the configuration. The ocsp nonce enable command adds a nonce extension to the OCSP request sent by a PKI entity. The undo ocsp nonce enable command cancels the configuration. By default, the OCSP request sent by a PKI entity contains a nonce extension.
